text: Directions () is a 2017 Bulgarian drama film directed by Stephan Komandarev. It was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival. ==Cast== * Ivan Barnev as Vlado * Georgi Kadurin as Popov * Borisleva Stratieva as Lora * Anna Komandareva as Nikol * Vassil Vassilev as Misho ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Bulgarian films Category:Bulgarian drama films Category:Bulgarian-language films
title: Directions (film)
